column4: Can I just delete /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules (it looks wrong)?  Will it definitely get regenerated on reboot?
move it to some other place, reboot, and see
yeah, looks like I'm gonna have to try, and hope nothing blows up, i've been googling for too long to make sure its okay...
just removing 70-persistent-net.rules did work, it was regenerated on boot, my networking is working now thanks.
